channel.title: How to get more commands to give scrolls

item.title: How to get more commands to give scrolls
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

my title is abit confusing but, this is what i mean.

i mean, if i go onto my server, there is a command (modinfo) and it comes up in a scroll.

the problem is i dont know what numbers i need to put onto the end.

example:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("modinfo") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@The rules of pkin-life", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("How to Become Mod/Admin", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("1. Respect all other players!", 8148); sendQuest("2. Respect Owners,Admins and Mods", 8149); sendQuest("3. Do not argue with staff/others.", 8150); sendQuest(" tell staff, if others doing wrong.", 8151); sendQuest("4. Help other players if they need help.", 8152); sendQuest("5. Play the server.", 8153); sendQuest("_____________________________________________________", 8154); sendQuest("If you follow all of these rules you will be fine", 8155); sendQuest("follow these, to increase your chance of getting staff position.", 8156); sendQuest("break these rules and it will decrease your chance of getting staff.", 8156); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

[code]if (playerRights <= 0) {

        sendQuest("info", 8144); // Title
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("How to Become Mod/Admin", 8145);
        sendQuest("----", 8147);
        sendQuest("1. Respect all players!", 8148);
        sendQuest("2. Respect Owners,Admins and Mods", 8149);
        sendQuest("3. be friendly with others/staff", 8150);
        sendQuest("4. dont dupe.", 8151);
        sendQuest("5. Help other players if they need help.", 8152);
        sendQuest("6. Play the server.", 8153);
        sendQuest("7. follow all rules.", 8154);
        sendQuest("   don'f beg for staff position.", 8155);
        sendQuest("_____________________________________________________", 8156);
        sendQuest("If you follow all of these rules,", 8157);
        sendQuest("you will have a better chance to get staff position!", 8158);
        sendQuest("", 8159);
        sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();
    }[/code]

how do i make another one like this. (i dont know what numbers i need to put on the end to make it work).

thanks,

Read full topic
item.source: How to get more commands to give scrolls
